CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(XometryJobID__c )),HYPERLINK("https://erp.xometry.com/outsourced-jobs?start=0&length=50&order%5B0%5D%5B%5D=1&order%5B0%5D%5B%5D=desc&search%5Bsearch%5D="+XometryJobID__c+"&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=&columns%5B%5D=%5EAccepted%7CCompleted%7CExpired%7CIn+Progress%7COffered%7CRejected%7CRescinded%7CVendor+Completed%24&n_columns=13","Go to this Job on the ERP Job Board", "_blank"),"")
CustomField.label: ERP Job Board URL
